ks.teaching.res

Class GlobalData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ks.teaching.res.GlobalData

  • public abstract class GlobalData
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class (only one per application, initialised at runtime) for holding miscellaneous application wide data.
    Author:
    kwss
